title: GOOGLE PIXEL 3XL -Customized ringtone does not function
content: Google Pixel 3xl ---I have set new .mp3 rigtone in my sound. Customized the ring tone for family contacts as contact..set ring tone..My sound..select .mp3 file and save...Still when contact dial me i hear general ring tone not the customized ring tone. Tried to re-start the phone and check..still same. Can somebody help?
